comment.author: 9253227@N02
comment._content: I have a book of photographs from the construction of the Golden Gate Bridge and nearby Oakland Bay Bridge. They are an amazing photographic record of the construction. I wonder how comprehensive the records of the SHB are by comparison?

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/9253227@N02] We have very comprehensive records of the building of the SHB. As a starting point have a look at this series of photographs investigator.records.nsw.gov.au/asp/photosearch/search.as.... We also have a summary page outlining SHB records here: www.records.nsw.gov.au/state-archives/digital-gallery/bro...

comment.author: 18901029@N00
comment._content: Sydney photographer Sam Wood produced several series of photos of the construction of the bridge. See www.flickr.com/photos/donshearman/sets/72157635606725244/ for scans of the ones I have.

comment.author: 74348425@N00
comment._content: These pictures are so good - great to see how the bridge works went.
